definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The set of parameters with the minimum mean square error is regarded as the calibration result.
sentences.chinese: 最後取矢徑均方誤差最小的參數組作爲標定結果。

sentences.english: Kalman filtering is an optimum filtering employing the norm of minimum mean square error.
sentences.chinese: 卡爾曼濾波採用最小均方誤差準則，是一種最優濾波。

sentences.english: The robust exponential stability in mean square of the system is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了該系統的魯棒均方指數穩定性。

sentences.english: Considering the model estimated parameters's posteriori risk in the mean-square loss model.
sentences.chinese: 在二次均方損失模型下，考慮模型估計的後驗風險。

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit

pinyin: zui4 da4 si4 ran2 gu1 ji4

definition: eigenvector (math.)/also written 特徵向量|特征向量
the power of a number (square, cube etc)/to exponentiate (math.)
